<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3287</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Holocaust Numbers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Holocaust Zahlen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Holocauste nombres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Números De Holocaust</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Numeri Di Holocaust</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμοί ολοκαυτώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Números De Holocaust</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an interactive lessonplan for 7th to 9th grade students and includes a worksheet which deals with the numbers related to populations and historical facts from the holocaust,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist für die 7. bis 9. Gradkursteilnehmer 
ein interaktives lessonplan und enthält einen Bogen, der die Zahlen 
beschäftigt, die auf Bevölkerungen und historischen Tatsachen vom 
holocaust in Verbindung gestanden werden,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un lessonplan interactif pour les 7èmes à
9èmes étudiants de catégorie et inclut un tableau qui traite les 
nombres liés aux populations et aux faits historiques du 
holocauste,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um lessonplan interativo para 7os a øs 
estudantes da classe e inclui uma folha que trate dos números 
relacionados às populações e aos fatos históricos do holocaust,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un lessonplan interattivo per i settimo -
noni allievi del grado ed include un foglio di lavoro che si occupa 
dei numeri relativi alle popolazioni ed ai fatti storici dal 
holocaust,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι διαλογικό ένα lessonplan για τον 7ο 
στους 9ους σπουδαστές βαθμού και περιλαμβάνει ένα φύλλο εργασίας
που εξετάζει τους αριθμούς σχετικούς με τους πληθυσμούς και τα 
ιστορικά γεγονότα από το ολοκαύτωμα,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un lessonplan interactivo para los 7mos 
a 9nos estudiantes del grado e incluye una hoja de trabajo que se 
ocupe de los números relacionados con las poblaciones y los hechos 
históricos del holocaust,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
